post:
Hi there,

Thank you for visiting our offer post. our KVM VPS is powered by Latest Xeon Coffee Lake or AMD Epyc CPUs. our network in NYC & LA is equipped with 2.5 Gbit port speed.
We don't own our servers or network. we simply rent them from known and well-trusted providers like Leaseweb, Hetzner, and Clouvider to run our multiple locations services.
All our services come with semi-managed non-robotic support.

Our base standard VPS comes with :
1 CPU vcore
1X CPU Weight
25GiB SSD Storage
1TiB Bandwidth
6.95$/month
Check more details on our [low-cost VPS page](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/virtualized-servers-vps/standard-virtualized-servers-vps "low-cost VPS page")

If you have any question you can always reach me via live chat

Best regards
Xsltel OU
